clues.text: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew walks by an exhibit in the Freud Museum in Vienna, Austria.)  In 1896, Freud created this word for the technique we associate with couches

It precedes -bone, -ball, -bar & -bill

clues.answer: the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame

clues.text: (Sarah of the Clue Crew is in the library of the Freud Museum, Vienna, Austria.)  I'm holding a first edition of Freud's 1923 classic work,"Das Ich und das Es", translated in 1927 as these 2 words
